lead_paragraph: Cam Newton had a wide smile after the game on Sunday, knowing that if any team hopes to prevent Carolina from reaching the Super Bowl, they'll have to go through Charlotte.

headline.print_headline: Newton, Panthers Beat Bucs 38-10, Clinch NFC's No. 1 Seed
headline.main: Newton, Panthers Beat Bucs 38-10, Clinch NFC's No. 1 Seed
